title.narrative: Children (girls and boys) and women who received multi-sectoral support in response to consequences of sexual violence in humanitarian situations

actual.value: 2018:GBV response was provided to five girl survivors among the displaced population in Oromia region

title.narrative: UNICEF-targeted children in humanitarian situations who were reunified with families/caregivers or received appropriate alternative care services

actual.value: 2018:11,072 children (4531 girls, 6541 boys) were reunified with their families/primary care givers and /or placed in appropriate alternative care arrangements. These includes children from refugee camps in Gambella, reception centres at Pamdong and Pagak, returnees from third country and among the Inter

title.narrative: (NOT VALID after Dec 31 2017) ) UNICEF-targeted children in humanitarian situations benefitting from psychosocial support

actual.value: 2018:43,187 children (20,539 girls, 22,648) received psychosocial support though child friendly spaces.
